titles.title: A bill to change the name of the Pacific Tropical Botanical Garden, a federally chartered organization, to the National Tropical Botanical Garden, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

calendar.text: Committee on Judiciary. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Judiciary. Reported to Senate by Senator Biden without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 1077.

action.text: Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 9/13/1988--Introduced. Changes the name of the Pacific Tropical Botanical Garden to the National Tropical Botanical Garden.
